title: Holy Himalayas
creator_credit: K Khandpur, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: A pilgrimage to the Hindu holy Badrinath and Kedarnath, in the Garwhal district of Uttar Pradesh. These have been centres of pilgrimage through the ages, are visited by thousands every year, who climb on foot through the Himalayan Mountains, near the Tibetan border. Shows something of the life of the district and the nature of Hindu devotion.
